thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com | 11 of 1705
thread.title: Joanne

author: Joanne
title: Joanne
text: I called less than 30 minutes after booking my flight and was told that it could not be changed. I had to pay $75 to cancel the reservation and then book another flight. This seemed excessive since I only need to change one part of the flight and the original reservation wasn't even 24 hour old -- it was more like 24 minutes old. The person I spoke to on the phone was not sympathetic in the least and even got my name wrong -- called me by my middle name. I've never used this service before and will never use it again.
